helloSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
helloSpire:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

helloSpire:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
helloSpire:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
helloSpire:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

helloSpire:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
helloSpire:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

helloSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
helloSpire:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !helloSpire:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

helloSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
helloSpire:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !helloSpire:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

helloSpire:StrikeGold.NAME: Strike Gold
helloSpire:StrikeGold.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Gain [#FFF77A]gold[] equal to unblocked damage. NL Exhaust.
